data: MH Psychosis Medications (Module)
Medications

When starting an antipsychotic medication, patients should have a baseline investigations including a fasting glucose and lipid profile, as well as an electrocardiogram. While on antipsychotic medication, patients should have weight and waist circumference monitored at baseline and weekly
